mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS s ON(s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND s.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taxOutside.staffName},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(t.ID_CARD_TYPE, #{taxOutside.idCardType})
AND s.ID_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taxOutside.staffIdCard},'%')
AND t.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taxOutside.remark},'%')
AND t.`YEAR` = #{taxOutside.year}
AND t.`MONTH` = #{taxOutside.month}

SELECT t.ID AS id, t.ID_CARD_TYPE, s.STAFF_ID, s.`NAME` AS staffName, s.ID_NUM AS staffIdCard, s.SORT_NUM_1 AS sortNum1, s.SORT_NUM_2 AS sortNum, t.CURRENT_INCOME, t.CURRENT_TAX_FREE_INCOME, t.BASIC_PENSION_IP, t.BASIC_MEDICAL_IP, t.UNEMPLOYMENT_IP, t.HOUSING_FUND, t.CUMULATIVE_CHILD_E, t.CUMULATIVE_CONTINUING_E, t.CUMULATIVE_HOME_LOAN_INTEREST, t.CUMULATIVE_HOUSING_RENT, t.CUMULATIVE_ELDERLY_SUPPORT, t.CORPORATE_ANNUITY, t.COMMERCIAL_HEALTH_INSURANCE, t.TAX_EXTENSION_PENSION_INSURANCE, t.OTHER, t.ALLOWANCE_FOR_DEDUCTION, t.TAX_DEDUCTION, t.FINAL_WAGE, (SELECT SUM(t.CURRENT_INCOME) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS currentIncomeSum, (SELECT SUM(t.CURRENT_TAX_FREE_INCOME) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS currentTaxFreeIncomeSum, (SELECT SUM(t.BASIC_PENSION_IP) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS basicPensionIpSum, (SELECT SUM(t.BASIC_MEDICAL_IP) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS basicMedicalIpSum, (SELECT SUM(t.UNEMPLOYMENT_IP) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS unemploymentIpSum, (SELECT SUM(t.HOUSING_FUND) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS housingFundSum, (SELECT SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_CHILD_E) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS cumulativeChildESum, (SELECT SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_CONTINUING_E) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS cumulativeContinuingESum, (SELECT SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_HOME_LOAN_INTEREST) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS cumulativeHomeLoanInterestSum, (SELECT SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_HOUSING_RENT) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS cumulativeHousingRentSum, (SELECT SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_ELDERLY_SUPPORT) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS cumulativeElderlySupportSum, (SELECT SUM(t.CORPORATE_ANNUITY) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS corporateAnnuitySum, (SELECT SUM(t.COMMERCIAL_HEALTH_INSURANCE) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS commercialHealthInsuranceSum, (SELECT SUM(t.TAX_EXTENSION_PENSION_INSURANCE) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS taxExtensionPensionInsuranceSum, (SELECT SUM(t.OTHER) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS otherSum, (SELECT SUM(t.ALLOWANCE_FOR_DEDUCTION) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS allowanceForDeductionSum, (SELECT SUM(t.TAX_DEDUCTION) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS taxDeductionSum, (SELECT SUM(t.FINAL_WAGE) FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID AND `YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr}) GROUP BY t.STAFF_ID) AS finalWageSum, t.REMARK, t.CREATE_TIME, t.MODIFY_TIME, t.`YEAR`, t.`MONTH` FROM cy_tax_outside AS t LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS s ON(s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND s.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taxOutside.staffName},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(t.ID_CARD_TYPE, #{taxOutside.idCardType})
AND s.ID_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taxOutside.staffIdCard},'%')
AND t.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taxOutside.remark},'%')
AND t.`YEAR` = #{taxOutside.year}
AND t.`MONTH` = #{taxOutside.month}
ORDER BY sortNum1 ASC, sortNum ASC

SELECT t.ID, t.ID_CARD_TYPE, s.STAFF_ID, s.`NAME` AS staffName, s.ID_NUM AS staffIdCard, s.SORT_NUM_1 AS sortNum1, s.SORT_NUM_2 AS sortNum, t.CURRENT_INCOME, t.CURRENT_TAX_FREE_INCOME, t.BASIC_PENSION_IP, t.BASIC_MEDICAL_IP, t.UNEMPLOYMENT_IP, t.HOUSING_FUND, t.CUMULATIVE_CHILD_E, t.CUMULATIVE_CONTINUING_E, t.CUMULATIVE_HOME_LOAN_INTEREST, t.CUMULATIVE_HOUSING_RENT, t.CUMULATIVE_ELDERLY_SUPPORT, t.CORPORATE_ANNUITY, t.COMMERCIAL_HEALTH_INSURANCE, t.TAX_EXTENSION_PENSION_INSURANCE, t.OTHER, t.ALLOWANCE_FOR_DEDUCTION, t.TAX_DEDUCTION, t.FINAL_WAGE, t.REMARK, t.CREATE_TIME, t.MODIFY_TIME, CONCAT(t.`YEAR`,'-',t.`MONTH`) AS year FROM cy_tax_outside AS t LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS s ON(s.STAFF_ID=t.STAFF_ID) WHERE (t.`YEAR`=#{taxOutside.yearForm} AND FIND_IN_SET(t.`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthForm}))
OR (t.`YEAR`=#{taxOutside.yearTo} AND FIND_IN_SET(t.`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthTo}))
ORDER BY sortNum1 ASC, sortNum ASC

SELECT SUM(t.CURRENT_INCOME) AS CURRENT_INCOME, SUM(t.CURRENT_TAX_FREE_INCOME) AS CURRENT_TAX_FREE_INCOME, SUM(t.BASIC_PENSION_IP) AS BASIC_PENSION_IP, SUM(t.BASIC_MEDICAL_IP) AS BASIC_MEDICAL_IP, SUM(t.UNEMPLOYMENT_IP) AS UNEMPLOYMENT_IP, SUM(t.HOUSING_FUND) AS HOUSING_FUND, SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_CHILD_E) AS CUMULATIVE_CHILD_E, SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_CONTINUING_E) AS CUMULATIVE_CONTINUING_E, SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_HOME_LOAN_INTEREST) AS CUMULATIVE_HOME_LOAN_INTEREST, SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_HOUSING_RENT) AS CUMULATIVE_HOUSING_RENT, SUM(t.CUMULATIVE_ELDERLY_SUPPORT) AS CUMULATIVE_ELDERLY_SUPPORT, SUM(t.CORPORATE_ANNUITY) AS CORPORATE_ANNUITY, SUM(t.COMMERCIAL_HEALTH_INSURANCE) AS COMMERCIAL_HEALTH_INSURANCE, SUM(t.TAX_EXTENSION_PENSION_INSURANCE) AS TAX_EXTENSION_PENSION_INSURANCE, SUM(t.OTHER) AS OTHER, SUM(t.ALLOWANCE_FOR_DEDUCTION) AS ALLOWANCE_FOR_DEDUCTION, SUM(t.TAX_DEDUCTION) AS TAX_DEDUCTION, SUM(t.FINAL_WAGE) AS FINAL_WAGE FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE (t.`YEAR`=#{taxOutside.yearForm} AND FIND_IN_SET(t.`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthForm}))
OR (t.`YEAR`=#{taxOutside.yearTo} AND FIND_IN_SET(t.`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthTo}))

SELECT t.STAFF_ID, t.MONTH, t.CURRENT_INCOME, t.CURRENT_TAX_FREE_INCOME, t.BASIC_PENSION_IP, t.BASIC_MEDICAL_IP, t.UNEMPLOYMENT_IP, t.HOUSING_FUND, t.CUMULATIVE_CHILD_E, t.CUMULATIVE_CONTINUING_E, t.CUMULATIVE_HOME_LOAN_INTEREST, t.CUMULATIVE_HOUSING_RENT, t.CUMULATIVE_ELDERLY_SUPPORT, t.CORPORATE_ANNUITY, t.COMMERCIAL_HEALTH_INSURANCE, t.TAX_EXTENSION_PENSION_INSURANCE, t.OTHER, t.ALLOWANCE_FOR_DEDUCTION, t.TAX_DEDUCTION, t.FINAL_WAGE FROM cy_tax_outside AS t WHERE t.STAFF_ID=#{taxOutside.staffId} AND t.`YEAR`=#{taxOutside.year} AND FIND_IN_SET(t.`MONTH`,#{taxOutside.monthArr})
